p: The case presented here demonstrated a patient who was diagnosed in an acute phase of pericarditis caused by SARS-CoV-2. Although cardiac involvement has been described previously in patients with COVID-19 and massive pneumonia, to our knowledge this is a rare case describing cardiac involvement in SARS-CoV-2 infection in a patient with mild pneumonia ( Farina et al., 2020, Inciardi et al., 2020).
